name: R4B-MessageHeader-R5-MessageHeader
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B MessageHeader into FHIR R5

element.display: A resource that describes a message that is exchanged between systems

target.display: A resource that describes a message that is exchanged between systems
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader`

R4B `MessageHeader.author` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MessageHeader.author` - author has change due to type change: R4B `author` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `author`
R4B `MessageHeader.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.contained`

element.display: Link to the definition for this message

target.display: Link to the definition for this message
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.definition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.definition`
R4B `MessageHeader.destination` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.destination`

R4B `MessageHeader.destination.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MessageHeader.destination.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.destination.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MessageHeader.destination.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.name`
R4B `MessageHeader.destination.receiver` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.receiver`

element.display: Particular delivery destination within the destination

target.display: Particular delivery destination within the destination
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.destination.target` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.destination.target`

element.display: The source of the data entry
Code for the event this message represents or link to event definition

target.display: Event code or link to EventDefinition
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.event[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `MessageHeader.event[x]` - event[x] has change due to type change: R4B event[x] uri has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 event[x]
R4B `MessageHeader.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: The actual content of the message

target.display: The actual content of the message
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.focus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.focus`
R4B `MessageHeader.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.implicitRules`
R4B `MessageHeader.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `MessageHeader.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.meta`

R4B `MessageHeader.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MessageHeader.reason` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.reason`

element.display: If this is a reply to prior message

target.display: If this is a reply to prior message
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.response` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.response`

R4B `MessageHeader.response.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.response.code` - code has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/response-code|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/response-code|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `MessageHeader.response.details` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.response.details`

R4B `MessageHeader.response.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.response.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MessageHeader.response.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.response.id`

R4B `MessageHeader.response.identifier` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `MessageHeader.response.identifier` - identifier has change due to type change: R4B identifier id has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 identifier

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.response.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.response.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MessageHeader.responsible` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.responsible`

element.display: Real world sender of the message

target.display: Real world sender of the message
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.sender` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `MessageHeader.sender` - sender has change due to type change: R4B `sender` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `sender`
R4B `MessageHeader.source` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source`
R4B `MessageHeader.source.contact` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source.contact`

element.display: Actual message source address or id

target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.source.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.source.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `MessageHeader.source.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.source.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `MessageHeader.source.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `MessageHeader.source.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source.name`

element.display: Name of software running the system

target.display: Name of software running the system
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.source.software` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source.software`
R4B `MessageHeader.source.version` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.source.version`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `MessageHeader.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `MessageHeader.text`
